model_name: 1.5 T 5 Star Wi-Fi Inverter Smart Split AC
description: Panasonic’s 1.5 T 5-Star Wi-Fi Inverter is equipped with True AI and voice control, 7-in-1 convertible modes, extra-quiet (~38 dB) performance, ideal for rooms ~17 m², energy-saving and premium comfort.

model_name: 1.5 T 5 Star Dual Inverter Split AC
description: LG Dual Inverter 1.5 T (5-Star) delivers whisper-quiet cooling (~39 dB), smart app control, AI 6-in-1 conversion, perfect for mid-sized rooms, for ₹46,590.
Godrej 1 T 5-Star Inverter Split offers high energy efficiency with quiet (~41 dB) operation and reliable brand after-sales, fitting smaller rooms (~12 m²), cost-effective ₹33,490.
Blue Star 1.5 T 5-Star Convertible Inverter provides adaptable cooling, efficient performance, and is ideal for ~18 m² rooms at ₹43,990.

model_name: 1 T 5 Star AI Flexicool Inverter Split
description: Carrier’s 1 T AI Flexicool Inverter Split (5-Star) uses AI to adjust cooling, runs quietly (~40 dB), and is a smart, efficient choice for compact spaces at ₹34,990.

model_name: 1 T 4 Star Intelli Smart Split AC
description: Haier’s 1 T Intelli Smart Split (4-Star) supports smart control via Wi-Fi, has good energy efficiency and silent operation (~43 dB), ideal for ~12 m² rooms.
Voltas 1.5 T Inverter Split (3-Star) is a value option delivering dependable cooling and lower noise (~45 dB) for ~18 m² rooms.

model_name: 1 T 4 Star AI Dual Inverter Split AC
description: LG 1 T 4-Star AI Dual Inverter Split is ultra-quiet at just 21 dB, with convertible cooling and excellent energy savings—ideal for small bedrooms.
Daikin 1.5 T 5-Star Inverter Split excels in energy efficiency (ISEER ~5.2), features Dew Clean coil and stabiliser-free operation, with silent ~38 dB cooling for ~18 m² rooms.

model_name: 1.5 T 3 Star Wi-Fi Inverter Smart Split
description: Panasonic’s 1.5 T 3-Star Wi-Fi Inverter Smart Split includes True AI, Wi-Fi/voice, PM 0.1 filter, offers quiet cooling (~38 dB) and is smart and versatile.
Daikin 0.8 T 3-Star Fixed Split AC delivers powerful quick cooling (Power-Chill), PM2.5 filtration, and ultra-quiet (~32 dB) performance—perfect for small rooms.
Lloyd 1 T 3-Star Inverter Split offers 5-in-1 convertible modes, anti-viral air filter, and very low noise (~32 dB), great for small-medium rooms.

model_name: 1.5 T 3 Star AI Flexicool Inverter Split
description: Carrier 1.5 T 3-Star AI Flexicool Inverter Split features 4-in-1 cooling, high-density filters, auto-clean cycle, and quiet 32 dB operation—balanced performance.

Whirlpool’s 1 T 3-Star Window AC offers stable performance for tight budgets, easy installation, and acceptable noise levels (~50 dB).
